tool.name: AddImg2MapbyTag
tool.displayname: Add GEE Image to Map by Asset Tag

param.name: asset_tag
param.dialogReference: The asset tag could be found at the dataset information page. For example, ee.Image("ACA/reef_habitat/v2_0") loads the Google Earth Engine Image by asset tag "ACA/reef_habitat/v2_0".

param.name: bands
param.displayname: Specify three bands for RGB visualization
param.dialogReference: The image dataset could contain multiple bands. However, the visualization only assigns the first three bands to produce RGB representation. For more information, please visit https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/guides/image_visualization

param.name: min_val
param.displayname: Specify the minimum value for visualization
param.dialogReference: The value(s) to map to 0. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band.

param.name: max_val
param.displayname: Specify the maximum value for visualization
param.dialogReference: The value(s) to map to 255. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band.

param.name: gamma
param.dialogReference: The value(s) by which to multiply each pixel value. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band, for example, 0.95, 1.1, 1

param.name: palette
param.displayname: Specify color palette in CSS-style color strings for visualization
param.dialogReference: List of CSS-style color strings (single-band images only). Specify comma-separated list of hex strings, for example, '00A600','63C600','E6E600'

tool.summary: This script adds the Google Earth Engine Image to ArcPro as a base map by its asset tag and customizes the visualization parameters. Please note that the dataset is added as a Tiled Service Layer (TSL), which cannot be edited. The user will need to download the dataset for analysis in ArcPro. To browse all datasets, please visit https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog.

idCitation.resTitle: Add GEE Image to Map by Asset Tag
